column2: 25-34 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I am 26 years old,  5'11, 186 pounds and I have been taking this product for a week now along with triple green tea fat burner. It has not improved anything sexually, and the other night my heart started racing so fast I thought I was gonna pass out. I was so dizzy I had to sit for and hour and drink a lot of water till it stopped. I would not recomend this product to anyone. Be careful!

My wife has a higher drive than I do.  I looked this stuff up, learned what it did, and 'borrowed' some from my dad.  It was amazing! Lil soldier was right back at it after busting a huge one.  Then again later on, just as hard as if nothing had happened all day.  She didn't know what hit her! So I bought some for myself. Big mistake. 1000mg is waaaaaay to much. Stomach cramps, severe headache, trouble sleeping, irritability, dizziness.  It takes too long to kick in an way too long to wear off. It works, but I don't think its worth the side effects.

column2: lilTULER, 19-24 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: First off, Let me start by saying I am a 21 year old male and did not use this for sexual gain.  This product was recommended by bodybuilding.com for help with fat loss. I am 5'9" and 171 lbs. I took this product once before lifting weights and it made my heart race and made me feel stronger. It is a vasodilator which allows more blood flow to the muscles.  It worked.  However, I also work third shift. After taking this product at 8am, I lifted and proceeded to go home and try to get some sleep. I DID NOT SLEEP ONE BIT! My mind was racing. I went to work at Midnight (still not tired after being up more than 24 hours) and felt sweaty.  I work at a hospital so I took my blood pressure which is normally 110/60 for my entire life.  My blood pressure was 172/98.  WAYYY TO HIGH for my age and fitness level. I never took it again. I fell asleep when I got home and slept all day. I can get better fat burning stimulant from caffinated gum and/or black coffee. Do not take if you have high blood pressure or heart problems!!!!

column2: amby, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I took this in controlled-dose, prescription form, so I knew I was getting the correct dose.  However, it didn't help with my problem and I had several terrible side-effects, such as very high anxiety, several gastric pains and problems, as well as terrible insomnia.I tried this when I fell into the (U.S.) Medicare Part D "donut hole", at which point the AndroGel that I had been taking (which worked quite well) was suddenly $437 per month for the required dosage!  Since I could not afford the AngroGel, my doctor prescribed this instead.It's a truly awful medicine that doesn't work and creates seriously unpleasant side-effects.

column2: german, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Caregiver)

column9: I take the GNC product standardized to 9mg yohimbine per capsule.  One capsule, 500mg tribulus (not sure if this is required), plus one-half cup of tea (lipton black tea bag) 1-2 hours before a 7pm dinner and I'm good past midnight.  And, for some reason, for me, the tea/caffeine is very important, but if I drink the whole cup, I have trouble sleeping.  To note, though, I don't have a severe case of ED, but just trying to keep it more than just a little firm.
